complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: AWS SES Email Service Setup and Configuration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down AWS SES setup into: 1) Install AWS SDK and configure credentials, 2) Set up IAM roles and permissions, 3) Verify domain and email addresses in SES, 4) Implement email sending function with templates, 5) Add retry logic and error handling, 6) Create health check endpoint and testing utilities
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to AWS service integration requiring IAM setup, domain verification, SDK configuration, email template creation, retry logic implementation, and comprehensive error handling. Involves multiple AWS console configurations and code implementation across several modules.
